item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 23, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. What happens when you make a move in lichess.org? (133 points | 66 comments)

9. GitButler now supports first class conflicts, making rebasing less annoying (51 points | 23 comments)

29. The global surveillance free-for-all in mobile ad data (181 points | 78 comments)
